titleStmt.title: An exposition of the Song of Solomon: called Canticles Together with profitable obseruations, collected out of the same. Perused and published by William Gouge, preacher of Gods Word in Black-Friers, London.
titleStmt.author: Finch, Henry, Sir, d. 1625.
Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Beale dwelling in Aldersgate streete and are there to be solde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
